Description: Fragment of neck and oval handle to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, worn, deleted. Name Kotes. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0371.13?
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (121)
